original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Praise Called ‚ÄúThe Glory of Noble Avalokite≈õvara‚Äù

original: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Lord of the World!

original: 'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten bla ma srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
translated: The Guru of the world, revered by the three worlds,

original: tshangs pa mchog dang 'chi med bdag pos bsngags pa ste //
analyzed: tshangs pa mchog dang 'chi med bdag pos bsngags pa ste //
translated: Praised by BrahmƒÅ, Vi·π£·πáu, and the Lord of Immortals,üîΩThe supreme king of sages, accomplished through praise,

original: bstod pas grub par mdzad pa thub pa'i rgyal po mchog / spyan ras gzigs pa'i dbang phyug mgon po mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: bstod pas grub par mdzad pa thub pa'i rgyal po mchog / spyan ras gzigs pa'i dbang phyug mgon po mchog gyur pa //
translated: The lord Avalokite≈õvara, the supreme protector,

original: gzugs mdzes bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po'i tshul 'dzin cing //
analyzed: gzugs mdzes bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po'i tshul 'dzin cing //
translated: Bearing the form of the beautiful son of the Sugata,

original: sku yi mchog ni mtshan gyis me tog gis brgyan pa //
analyzed: sku yi mchog ni mtshan gyis me tog gis brgyan pa //
translated: His supreme body adorned with the flowers of the marks,

original: bde bar gshegs pa 'dod dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'dzin //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa 'dod dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'dzin //
translated: Wearing the crown of the boundless desires of the Sugata,

original: g-yon pa'i phyag ni gser gyi padmas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag ni gser gyi padmas rnam par brgyan //
translated: His left hand adorned with a golden lotus,

original: g-yas pas yi dags bkres pa'i gdung ba sel bar mdzad //
analyzed: g-yas pas yi dags bkres pa'i gdung ba sel bar mdzad //
translated: His right hand dispelling the suffering of hunger and thirst of the pretas.

original: dri med dmar ser ral ba gya gyu dub 'dra//
analyzed: dri med dmar ser ral ba gya gyu dub 'dra//
translated: His unblemished face is reddish-yellow, with disheveled hair.

original: @114a * // zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag rgyas shing gang 'dra'i zhal //
analyzed: @114a * // zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag rgyas shing gang 'dra'i zhal //
translated: His face is like a full reflection of the moon,

original: mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan ni padma lta bur yangs //
analyzed: mchog tu mdzes pa'i spyan ni padma lta bur yangs //
translated: His eyes are very beautiful, like lotuses.

original: kha ba dung ltar rnam par dkar ba'i 'gram dogs can //
analyzed: kha ba dung ltar rnam par dkar ba'i 'gram dogs can //
translated: His cheeks are as white as snow and conch shells.

original: lte ba'i gnas ni chu skyes dkar po dang mtshungs shing //
analyzed: lte ba'i gnas ni chu skyes dkar po dang mtshungs shing //
translated: His navel is like a white lotus,

original: sku dang phyag mthil padma'i 'dab ltar shin tu mnyen /
analyzed: sku dang phyag mthil padma'i 'dab ltar shin tu mnyen /
translated: His body and palms are very soft, like lotus leaves.

original: gzhon nu'i na tshod chags pa'i tshon gyis ma gos pa //
analyzed: gzhon nu'i na tshod chags pa'i tshon gyis ma gos pa //
translated: He is a youth, not yet tainted by the colors of passion,

original: me tog phreng ba mang po'i sbyor bas rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba mang po'i sbyor bas rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the combination of many flower garlands.üîΩFrom the pores of his face, he emits the roar of the king of beasts,

original: zhal gyi sbu bas nas ri dags rgyal po'i nga ro dang // ston ka'i chu 'dzin 'brug gi sprin sgra sgrogs pa bzhin //
analyzed: zhal gyi sbu bas nas ri dags rgyal po'i nga ro dang // ston ka'i chu 'dzin 'brug gi sprin sgra sgrogs pa bzhin //
translated: Like the sound of autumn clouds and rain.

original: nu ma g-yon du ri dags pags pas nges par bkab //
analyzed: nu ma g-yon du ri dags pags pas nges par bkab //
translated: He definitely covers his left breast with a deer skin,

original: nor bus spras pa'i ska rags sku la 'chang ba ste //
analyzed: nor bus spras pa'i ska rags sku la 'chang ba ste //
translated: Wearing a jeweled belt around his body.

original: sta zur rnam par dkris pa'i ras kyi gos bzangs 'dzin //
analyzed: sta zur rnam par dkris pa'i ras kyi gos bzangs 'dzin //
translated: Wearing a fine cloth wrapped around his shoulders,

original: nor bu'i rkang gdub mdzes par brgyus pa zung gi zhabs //
analyzed: nor bu'i rkang gdub mdzes par brgyus pa zung gi zhabs //
translated: His feet adorned with beautiful jeweled anklets,

original: glang po rnam par rtsen pa dag dang ngang pa'i 'gros //
analyzed: glang po rnam par rtsen pa dag dang ngang pa'i 'gros //
translated: With the gait of a playful elephant and a swan,

original: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing 'dra ngo mtshar gzugs //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing 'dra ngo mtshar gzugs //
translated: His wondrous form like a wish-fulfilling gem or a wish-granting tree.

original: dpal ldan po ta la yi gnas su nges bzhugs te //
analyzed: dpal ldan po ta la yi gnas su nges bzhugs te //
translated: Residing in the glorious Potala abode,

original: bsam gtan bzhi la mnyam par gzhag pa'i spyan mnga' zhing //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la mnyam par gzhag pa'i spyan mnga' zhing //
translated: With eyes of equipoise in the four dhyanas,

original: dga' dang snying rje'i rang bzhin g-yo zhing mdzes par gzigs //
analyzed: dga' dang snying rje'i rang bzhin g-yo zhing mdzes par gzigs //
translated: Glancing with the nature of joy and compassion,

original: der gnas don gyi phyag gis rims dang nad 'phrog byed //
analyzed: der gnas don gyi phyag gis rims dang nad 'phrog byed //
translated: With the hand of meaning residing there, taking away fever and illness.

original: dge zhing zhi byed bde ba mang por mdzad pa'i phyag / bsod nams mang po nye bar bsags pa'i phyag mthil can //
analyzed: dge zhing zhi byed bde ba mang por mdzad pa'i phyag / bsod nams mang po nye bar bsags pa'i phyag mthil can //
translated: The hand that creates virtue, peace, and much happiness, with the palm of a hand that has accumulated much merit,

original: srid gsum mthar byed sa dang nam mkhar spyod rnams kyis //
analyzed: srid gsum mthar byed sa dang nam mkhar spyod rnams kyis //
translated: The hand that ends the three existences, moving in the earth and sky,

original: bsngags pa'i sku ni rnam pa sna tshogs mi 'khrugs shing //
analyzed: bsngags pa'i sku ni rnam pa sna tshogs mi 'khrugs shing //
translated: The body praised by those who move in the earth and sky, with various forms that are unshakable,

original: 'o ma'i chu gter rgya mtsho lta bur rtag tu gnas //
analyzed: 'o ma'i chu gter rgya mtsho lta bur rtag tu gnas //
translated: The ocean of milk is always present.

original: rgyal ba'i ye shes rgya mtshon chen po'i pha mthar son //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i ye shes rgya mtshon chen po'i pha mthar son //
translated: The ocean of the Victorious One's wisdom has reached the other shore.

original: pha rol phyin bcu bdud kyi stobs las nges par rgyal //
analyzed: pha rol phyin bcu bdud kyi stobs las nges par rgyal //
translated: Through the ten perfections, he has definitely conquered the power of Mara.

original: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis dben par spyod mdzad dam pa'i don //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhis dben par spyod mdzad dam pa'i don //
translated: The practice of the four pure abodes is the supreme meaning.

original: gnyis med ye shes de bzhin nyid du rnam sangs rgyas //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes de bzhin nyid du rnam sangs rgyas //
translated: Non-dual wisdom is fully enlightened in suchness.

original: bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang bstod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang bstod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I praise and prostrate to the Bhagavan, the noble Avalokitesvara.

original: dge slong ma zla mdzes kyis bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so /üîΩ// / 'di ni rgya gar shar phyogs kyi btsun pa tsandra shr'i'i ngag la 'byung ba dang rgya dpe la bstun nas /
analyzed: dge slong ma zla mdzes kyis bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so / // / 'di ni rgya gar shar phyogs kyi btsun pa tsandra shr'i'i ngag la 'byung ba dang rgya dpe la bstun nas /
translated: The praise composed by the nun Candraprabha is complete.

original: dge slong bsod nams rnam rgyal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: dge slong bsod nams rnam rgyal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: This was translated by the monk Sonam Namgyal, comparing it to the words of the Indian eastern monk Chandrashri and the Tibetan translation.
